mapper.update: update underoneyear set jan = #{jan, jdbcType=INTEGER}, feb = #{feb, jdbcType=INTEGER}, mar = #{mar, jdbcType=INTEGER}, apr = #{apr, jdbcType=INTEGER}, may = #{may, jdbcType=INTEGER}, jun = #{jun, jdbcType=INTEGER}, jul = #{jul, jdbcType=INTEGER}, aug = #{aug, jdbcType=INTEGER}, sep = #{sep, jdbcType=INTEGER}, oct = #{oct, jdbcType=INTEGER}, nov = #{nov, jdbcType=INTEGER}, deb = #{deb, jdbcType=INTEGER}
